_sText:
SIZE:
52.6mb compressed, 63.0mb uncompressed.

VERSION 5:
EDIT: Changed the skybox and the sun position, and made general improvements to the map to both look better and perform better!
-Songs at the beginning now play at the beggining of a round rather than someone activating a trigger to begin them.
-Fall damage has been disabled.
-Ladders on the front of the bridge only function some time after the lever is pressed, therefore removing the ability to climb them before opening and shutting the door.
-Made it easier to defend the inner bridge doors.
-The inner bridge doors are now faster.
-Made it easier to defend the entrance to the cemetary.
-Changed how the right path in the cemetery works (added text, new sound)
_Added a helicopter to the center of the cemetary.
-Made the second combine access wall easier to defend as well as adding new text for it.
-changed the secret weapons to be more special.
-Removed some sprites.
-Made the invisible walls surrounding the map higher.
-Made the map look better.
-General performance increases.
-Fixed spark effects around the map.
-Changed the end teleport timer.
-Shortened the end push.
-Added more thumpers.

VERSION 4:
EDIT: Added the skybox to the bsp so that there isn't an error that occurs.
EDIT2: Added cubemaps to the PAK, as well as changing the location of one cubemap/adding another. Changed the textures of some blocks.
EDIT3:Added a playerclip near the secret AWP so people can not fall off.
Changed the Citadel 'change' activation area. Now it activates at the end castle.
Added env-sprites.
Removed Citadel Explosion.
Changed the skybox, and placed the sun in a new area accordingly.
Changed the sun/env-enviroment color.
Changed teleports so that they teleport to random locations rather than just one.
Added new console messages to facilitate actions.
Added portal effect on top of citadel.
Added thumpers around the landscape to force people to run around them.
Changed some music to fit players' request.
Changed the water texture in some areas.
Changed the timer for the teleport at the second Combine Access Wall.
Changed name of map to avoid a map error.

VERSION 3:
Removed the 'portal spire' and added the Citadel (THAT MOVES) instead. Added a sound that goes off when the citadel moves.
Added a 'surprise' at the end.
Added random props along the running areas to slow people down.
Created teleport occasions that bring the zombies closer to humans.
The strider has proper animations now.
Added a thumper with animations.
Fixed some lights.
Removed rain and fires to improve frame-rates.
Reduced file size.
Changed some music to reflect players' interest.

A SMALL UPDATE:
Fixed the open displacements.

VERSION 2:
Added another hold area.
Added walls to make the map smaller/less open space.
Increased the trigger times on the bridge(now you have to hold for longer).
Lovely Cube maps are back.
The map is only 5 mb larger in real space, but the zip file is only 1 mb larger (if not less.)
Added a door that opens when you get to the castle.
Changed the inner door at the bridge so that it starts closed.
Added a button to open the door at the front of the bridge. (You have to hold while it opens, then run it to close it.)

ORIGINAL TEXT:
Make your way through the strange blend of old and new so you can survive!
This is my first map! Hopefully, it will be worth the download.
IN CASE YOU ARE WONDERING:
Captain Cliche created the landscape, objectives, water, 3d skybox and main buildings. I fixed nearly every error in the map, added the tower in the 3d skybox (as well as the portal effect and the lasers) changed the textures of things, added more console messages,created the teleporter boxes, changed the variables of certain entities  (such as the door closing times), removed the fog present in the original map, added music and random song choosers, fixed the path-chooser entity, removed and added rubble, and many other things.

_aChangeLog.text: Added the missing overlays for the attacks
Added all the sprites for the DDR mode
Fixed a spot where you have to crouch, this was meant because CSGO Models are bigger.
Added console text for the Boss Attacks

_aLatestUpdates._sText: To download it, use the dropbox link

From the creator of ze_jurassicpark comes The Lost World, the highly anticipated sequel that throws you back into the fray as a seasoned mercenary stranded in a land before time where prehistoric creations roam freely among rich forests and ruined laboratories. You must run, drive, and shoot your way to freedom through a pristine jungle habitat where every creature is a threat and every man a meal. Welcome to the food chain.

Features:

-Open ended environment. Unlike other escape maps, there are no unnatural perfectly square corridors that confine you to a very small area. Run in any direction at your own discretion.

-Drivable Mobile Command Center. Improve your chances of survival by commandeering the abandoned RV at the hunter's camp, but don't let it sink!

-Dynamic spawn location. You have just twenty seconds to flee from a falling plane before it crashes and burns, with you in it!

-Dynamic, deadly predators. I'm not just talking about the zombies, either. The local inhabitants have a fondness for human flesh, and they have the teeth and claws to help appease that huge appetite of theirs.

-Powerful electric fences left over from the failed Site B experiment.

-Ambient wildlife, sounds, and theme music.

-Multiple routes to the embryonic research compound.

-Custom built V-22 Osprey VSTOL by Butterknife.

Story:

Isla Sorna, 0300 Zulu:

Shortly after the Nublar incident, Peter Ludlow acquired control of the inGen Corporation. The ruthless nephew of John Hammond, Ludlow is bent on turning the previously failed experiment of prehistoric genesis into a profitable enterprise. InGen hunters have already been dispatched to Isla Sorna to gather specimen for the new JP: San Diego amusement park.

Biosyn has sent a contingent of mercenaries to hamper InGen's expedition to Site B. As a merc, your mission was to perform a HALO insertion at base camp-however disaster struck when your transport's right wing was torn asunder from a tropical storm. Your only hope is to reach the embryo research compound further inland to signal the nearby U.S. fleet for a search and rescue.

You will most likely be put on trial upon your return. If you make it out alive.

Map by Butterknife (Jaekto)
Texture support: Japetheape
Flora, Fauna: Stene, Raptor Phillips
intox. studios

Sorry for so many versions... 

ze thelostworld redux 101j
==========================

Main fixes/changes
------------------

- Helicopter fall out problem sorta fixed (not 100% reliable. ride at your own risk)
- Different spawning area
- Ping/Lag issues around fence area fixed
- Afk teleports
- Boat speed altered to be the same time as other routes

Other less noticeable changes
----------------------------

- Increased fps by adding dividing sky brushes
- Increased health of the wood that holds up the falling rocks
- Falling rocks now break to avoid player stuck
- Logs over electric fence now wont lag when you walk over them
- Removed jump for the bus that would often kill players
- Various kill commands changed to avoid server crash
- Bridge charge detonation has longer delay
- Lag spot when crossing bridge fixed
- C4's on bridge now are not solid
- New trex model to replace sue.mdl
- Various changes to dynamic model settings
- Tree camp spots near end removed fixed
- End killer deals more damage per second
- Flying dino now not solid to avoid rare collision with helicopter
- New fence models thanks to [LeGrem](http://www.gamebanana.com/members/905472 "")
- New teleports for players who fall into water near end area

Known bugs in versions J

- Bus under heavy load of players wont move fast or at all
- Model used for boat may rarely bug and appear not solid however you wont actually fall through it

The Lost World is back in a fresh new package from the mesozoic-minded imagination of Butterknife and this time survival will be harsh and brutal. Experience the thrill of escaping the clutches of death whether it takes the form of a tumbling jet liner or the jaws of Isla Sorna's many formidable predators. Surge through the jungle on an adrenaline roller-coaster as you make your way to the Embryonic Research facility, and relish the sweet taste of victory as you take the only helicopter ride out of this primordial Hell. Just remember to keep your eyes sharp, your ears tuned, your feet swift, and stay off those damn game trails!

List of dinosaur species native to Isla Sorna (South East Sector):

Camarasaurus supremus
Utahraptor ostrommaysi
Stegosaurus armatus
Triceratops horridus
Tyrannosaurus rex
Velociraptor sornaensis (Deinonychus)

List of other species:

Homo sapiens sapiens (a.k.a. YOU)
Pteranodon longiceps
Tylosaurus proriger
Carcharodon carcharias (Great white shark)



Story:

Isla Sorna, 2300 Zulu:

Shortly after the Nublar incident, Peter Ludlow acquired control of the inGen Corporation. The ruthless nephew of John Hammond, Ludlow is bent on turning the previously failed experiment of prehistoric genesis into a profitable enterprise. InGen hunters have already been dispatched to Isla Sorna to gather specimen for the new JP: San Diego amusement park.

Biosyn has sent a contingent of mercenaries to hamper InGen's expedition to Site B. As a merc, your mission was to perform a HALO insertion at base camp-however disaster struck when your transport's right wing was torn asunder from a tropical storm. Your only hope is to reach the embryo research compound further inland to signal a nearby InGen cruiser for a search and rescue.

You will most likely be put on trial upon your return. If you make it out alive.

Map by Butterknife (Jaekto)
Texture support: Phraggah
Flora, Fauna: Stene, Raptor Phillips
intox. studios

Huey prefab by Aurora
Bunker prefab by naky3
nuke by westsid3r

this is my first zombie escape map 
more of this map will be coming

ZE_TEXTURESCAPE_V1 Okay guys, dont judge this map only by screenies, cuz' u need to feel the map. There is alot of great traps and stuff, that makes the gameplay exiting. There is 64 spawns and 2 buyzones (32 spawns/ 1buyzone per team) See the video for all the traps and stuff. The video is fullbright because i wanted you to see all the traps. My map is very dark, soooo, flashlight should be enabled.

ZE TESV SKYRIM
==============

Map Features:
-------------
- 5 Stages
- 5 Human items and other various items
- 4 Zombie items
- 4 bosses
- Level system (win a stage as a human and you will gain 1 level)
- Random weather with colorcorrection
- Custom particles


Human items:
------------
- Level 1 "Mage": Left click fires a ball of fire that damages zombies(8 sec cooldown). Right click heals nearby humans (small range, 40 sec cooldown)
- Level 1 "Nightingale": Slight speed increase, Right click fires an arrow that does 1.5k damage (5 sec cooldown).
- Level 2 "Dovahkiin": Left click is his melee attack (Damages and pushes zombies). Right click is his "Fus Ro Dah" shout (Pushes zombies very far, 80 sec cooldown).
- Level 3 "Archmage": Left click shoots a ball of electricity (Pushes and damages zombies, 9 sec cooldown). Right click works like a flamethrower (Damages,puts zombies on fire and slows them down for 6 seconds, 60 sec cooldown)
- Level 4 "Daedric": Left click is melee attack (Pushes and damages zombies). Right click for his "Nuke" (Deals 20k damage in a fairly big radius to zombies, 60 sec cooldown and only 2 uses)

All the Human items **SECONDARY ATTACK** deals damage to the final boss, it is up to you if you want to use them.

Zombie items:
------------- 
- Level 1 "Werewolf": Left click for melee attack(Deals damage to humans,2 sec cooldown). Right click "Roars" (Frightens nearby humans aka slows them down, 25 sec cooldown).
- Level 2 "Troll": Left click for melee attack(Deals damage to humans,2 sec cooldown). Right click "Roars" (Heals all nearby zombies to 10k hp and also heals himself for 1.5k hp,35 sec cooldown).
- Level 3 "Giant":  Left click for melee attack(Deals a huge amount of damage to humans,5 sec cooldown). Right click for the "Stomp" (Slows down nearby humans,15 sec cooldown).
- Level 4 "Dragonpriest": This item has no knockback and has 25k hp, so he can avoid the "Daedric Nuke attack". Right click freezes and kills all humans within a small radius. This item tho is slower then regular zombies.

**All zombie items except dragonpriest should be shot in the head region, if you shoot lower they won't receive any knockback.**

V4 Changelog:
=============

- New skybox and lighting
- 4 random weathers with color correction
- Better optimized hopefully
- Fixed the famous dragon glitch
- Fixed some other various glitches.
- Some new particles
- Stage 1 keep and dungeon were remade
- Stage 1 boss is different
- Freeze staff on stage 1 has 2 uses again (since stage 1 should be slightly easier and 3 uses would make it too human sided imo)
- Stage 2 has a new way for zombies(not much changed on this stage)
- Stage 3 was remade completely.
- Stage 4 beginning is different(teleports humans randomly to one of the 2 paths)
- Stage 4 boss is tweaked a little bit, along with the boss area
- The elder scroll item no longer slows downs zombies when u use it, it just damages the stage 5 boss now.
- Zombie items should be less glitchy now, I tried to fix the knockback issue and the "spinning" but I make no promises(I tried my best..)
- The level 2 human item or so called "dohvakiin" now has 3 "forms".
	- If you are lvl 2 and pick the item he will have a flaming sword and his special attack is a fire shout which deals quite a bit damage and sets them on fire for 5 seconds(60 second cooldown).
	- If you are lvl 3 and pick the item he will have an icey sword and his special attack is an icey looking shout which slows down zombies(70 second cooldown).
	- If you are lvl 4 and pick the item he will have a electricity looking sword and his special attack is the old fus ro dah shout(80 second cooldown).

_sText:
This is a Zombie Escape map for Counter-Strike: Source.

If you see a bug, please report me via PM or comment section.

I made this map over the course of about 3 weeks, and it's the first map that would actually be worthy of being uploaded. This map was in dedication to the only server I have EVER played on; Ibis.gaming. The map is akin to the popular map ze_random, but has incredibly smaller, and yet more challenging segments. I ran into a few problems while making the map

1: I had no idea how to custom textures (too lazy)

2: Water textures wouldn't load so some drops might seem a little weird

3: certain entities just didn't like loading

Have fun!

Screw you Srongfield

-Redacted-




Edit: Fixed the health on breakable objects

This map is something I have been working for about 40 days now, on and off. I started 'strong' and got the visuals done in about two weeks, along with the interesting entities, and then did the boring bunch of things later. The map is set on an tropical island -called Isla Bonita- somewhere near something, perhaps in central/south America. It is composed by two acts (which I tried to make different in terms of feel, dunno if I achieved it). I made the map with the intention of hosting a global server contest (like I already did with paper escaper but without being a bitch and actually rewarding people). Because of this, when the beta testing period is over (two weeks should be fine for it?) I will upload a new version with the proper contest billboards and everything being explained on them. The gameplay should be stealth-styled, meaning you have to infiltrate and unlock doors/things while the rest of the team holds. The map is probably a bit too hard at this point (but I don't believe it is broken hard, just a bit different and therefore harder by the general effect of new-things-that-people-have-to-learn). The first act is doable in 9 minutes (in fact, on a perfect run, 7:30 minutes would do fine, perhaps 7:45). The second act shouldn't be affected by round time because timings don't depend that much on players. It is a perfect streak map. That is, once you fail, you go back to the beginning. Think of it as a very long round. I know it can be annoying and bother some (and I wasn't fully sure of doing it until I kept testing and testing it), but I believe this can keep the map interesting without relying on an absurd number of long, half assed levels. The visuals are not too good in my opinion, specially lighting. On these terms, I recommend every player to enable color corrections (mat_colorcorrection 1) because the map came out a bit too bright. We will see how/in which terms does this change. Finally, the map is the first to feature a score system, at least in Zombie Escape. The map will keep track of your progress and, upon being beaten, will output a number in the range 0-255 that will be your final score. I suspect the score might be a bit unbalanced on this beta version (perhaps you can't get more than 150~ points because I left by accident a few things out). This, however, will be fixed for the contest/upcoming versions, so you can at least get a taste of it at the moment. The map will also output your score in terms of the state of the mission, time consumed to fulfill the mission and number of tries to fulfill the mission. The map features: - Two acts - Score system - Overwrittable config system (the map forces configs but server admins can overwrite them if they find them to be too much - only the one forced by the server will be considered valid [YES IT DISABLES YOUR FUCKING ICE/LIGHT NADES - DEAL WITH IT]) - C4 Bombs - A terrible story that doesn't help at all written by a non-native speaker - Color corrections and color correction based dynamic effects - Particles - Hacking - Pew pewing - Stealth styled gameplay - Radar (I fucked up a bit, but nothing too serious) - No item copypaste - A cinema - Secrets - More pew pewing - Y CAN'T METROID CRAWL!!!!!!!1!11 You are allowed to do as you please with the map, decompile, open it and ruin it or shove it up your ass. I don't mind if you claim it as yours, if you think you created whatever the fuck you want to get from it or whatever. You didn't. And I didn't either, I just made some entities work together over an engine that is open enough to let me do it. It would be nice, however, to at least mention that you didn't fully do it (but please, don't mention me at all ever). -------------- On a side note: while testing the map we noticed it is specially suited for co-op gameplay and training modes. As so, the upcoming versions will, hopefully (if entities aren't a bitch, which is something I am afraid of as of now) have a training mode. Said mode will have regeneration areas and ammo refills (and will be meant for playing with friends in LAN/through Hamachi). ---- b2 changes: - Changed a few teleports (they enable later) - Elevator vent @ Act I breaks 2 seconds later - Warehouse hold takes 5 seconds less - Cave hold takes a bit less - Added a floor marker with caution textures so people hold and only a few go into the vent. It's not really needed since they shouldn't run like little bitches and people would learn the way in the long run, but whatever. ---- b3 changes: - Changed the first teleport to avoid zombie hunting. - Fixed a broken displacement near the first area - Fixed the last teleport in Act II that wouldn't work at all - Tweaked the score system a bit, now it would be quite close to the contest version's score system - Minor visual tweaks - Added a guide to get to the penisgun somewhere in/on/under/through the map ------------------- The contest version (v1) has been released. It hasn't changed much, although I've done a few balance tweaks here and there and fixed a few issues (let's hope for the shake of it that I didn't fuck up while doing so). The contest, as explained in the webpage I've set up for it (http://taboocarnation.tk) will depend on the score you get when you with both levels in a perfect streak; however, I'll take into account how well played the map was. To measure everything, I'll need both levels being demo'd (I know it can be a hassle, but hey...). Another submission requirement will be to send the complete player list and a few other thingies (the score, temporal satisfaction grade, etc...). Admin help is not allowed, and there have to be at least 30 players playing (spectators are, as so, not counted). ------------------- The final (I hope so) version (v2) has been released. Aside from edict optimizations, the contest winner billboards and the cvar system nothing else has changed. For servers that would rather play the map in a casual fashion, I'd recommend using the two following cvars: - taboo_extra_tries_enable - taboo_items_enable They will enable both 5 tries on the second act (instead of going directly back to the first act; this will, however, imply a penalty points-wise) and the map items (which feature a medikit, an ammo box, explosive landmines and an experimental deathray).

| ZE_SURVIVORS |
================

CREATED BY JB_GAMBLE

MAP REQUIRES NO BLOCK

|FEATURES|
==========

64 PLAYERS

3 DIFFERENT ENVIRONMENTS

ENVIRONMENT RANDOMLY SELECTED AT START OF EVERY ROUND

|CITY STREETS|
--------------

Spawn in the an ally and make your way through the city streets to safety.

|CITY BUILDING|
---------------

Spawn at the top of a building and make your way down through the building to the base of the building.

|COLD MOUNTAIN|
---------------

Spawn on a mountain and make your way to the extraction point further up the mountain in a race against time and the cold.

|UPDATES|
=========

**B5**
------

- Fixed Glitch at Waterfall | Zombies Jumping Across to Last Hold Area
- Small Minor Changes/Alterations

**B4**
------

- Fixed Points Not Being Awarded To Every Player That Won

**Cold Mountain Changes**

- Altered Plane Crash Fire Spot Layout
- Altered Last Fire Hold Approach | Small Rocks To Climb
- Small Minor Changes/Alterations

**City Streets Changes**

- Removed Full Level Stage
- Clipped Entrance To Water Pipe To Make Easier To Enter
- Fixed Teleport Glitch
- Small Minor Changes/Alterations

**City Building Changes**

- Added Small Area At Fan Ending
- Added More Time Before Nuke Goes Off

**B3**
------

**Cold Mountain Changes**

- 4 Damage Modes | Low, Medium, High and Impossible
- Fires Don't Damage Player
- Minor Visual Changes

**City Streets Changes**

- Split Level Into 3 Stages | Part 1, Part 2 and Full Level
- Part 1 | Created New Area And Ending
- Minor Gameplay/Visual Changes

**City Building Changes**

- 3 Modes | Easy, Normal and Hard

**Overall Changes**

- Added Admin Room | Located Just Below City Streets First Spawn




**B2**
------

- Fixed Button Spamming
- Fixed City Building End Glitch
- Fixed Missing Textures
- Removed Open Water Level
- Increased Heal Amount At Fire Spots
- Altered End At Cold Mountain - More Balanced Hold
- Minor Gameplay/Visual Changes

|FEEDBACK|
==========

Bugs, Glitches and Gameplay Issues

_aChangeLog.text: Some places in the levels have been changed
Fixed a bug with the particles
Was changed to 3 surf after 1 defense

_sText:
Author: uVerin
Testers: Wolverine, VreDNbli and SibGamers.net Server.
Special thanks: Perfect, ZombieFeyk & dima047 for hints!

From Ze_MotanumInc, Ze_ApertureScience, Ze_Surf_Fcility, sp_Main_Four, koth_Aperture_Science_III comes...

Ze_Surf_Facility_V2

You escape from the Zombies, but there is no running only surfing! Well, there is some running, here and there.

Features
-Tutorial Level
-Automatic Surf Settings
-Supports mode where zombie is not sent back to spawn
-AFK killer
-Noob friendly, retry and move up if you fail. No fall damage
-A whole new stage! Racing!
-3 stages not including tutorial to surf
-18 different combinations with the randomized stage selection
-Lighted map!
-6 minutes of pure adrenaline
-Surf Boards
-First zombies to finish the final stage get 15k hp!
-Teamwork and communication required!

NOTE, as with any map, you can't please everyone. Just upload it and give it a try! You won't regret it! As you learn the map, and get better at surfing it will become more enjoyable and more fun!

Sorry for the delay, but I guess is better late than never! This is probably my last Ze map, as I am moving on with other projects, but I just wanted to finish this up for everyone in the community to enjoy!

I might re-compile my maps for CS:GO if a zombie mod becomes available.

Developed by Eugenio 'Motanum' Roman 

Bugs, comments, suggestions to agent_2114@hotmail.com or eugenio.motanum91@gmail.com

See screenshots

Installation, just paste the all of the files in the rar on your maps folder for counter strike source
Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps


Note, ze_ApertureScience_OB got trashed because of ported models, if you want the map for your server just pm for a link to mediafire

From the developer of ze_ApertureScience and ze_MotanumInc comes

Ze_Surf_Facility!

A different, yet challenging and still fun map! 

You like to fight zombies? And surf? well this is the map for you!

Don't know how to surf? Do not worry, with the included tutorial level, you will get your head around the basics in no time!

Story
For some reason, you are in a facility where they only way to escape is through surfing and defending!

Features
-Automatic map settings! No need for admin to change any accelerations!
-A TUTORIAL LEVEL for new players to get their head around surfing in no time!
-NO FALL DAMAGE! 
-Fell of the surfing block? Get tele'd back to your last checkpoint and try again!
-Teleport campers and people who didnt finish a surfing stage, so you get to carry on!
-Random route is chosen, so show your abilities in a varied surfing way!
-Up to 12 combinations of route! (3 and 4)
-Carefully design defense areas
-Open minded defense area, with up to 5 different holding places, so spread out!
-King of the hill style defense 
-Corridor defense area. Team work and shooting coordination required!
-10,000 hp for zombies who finish final surf in less than 15 seconds after the first humans finish!
-Can you get a surf board? ( replaces deagle, you need ot throw before hand).
-5 second afker killer. 5 seconds for those who who do not need afk killer because people like to respawn
-PLAYTESTED! It went trhough several versions all tested online on a public server.
-A different, yet challenging and still fun map! 
-More than 72 spawn points!

NOTE, as with any map, you can't please everyone. Just upload it and give it a try! You won't regret it! As you learn the map, and get better at surfing it will become more enjoyable and more fun!

Even the map is fullbright, I made sure that all textures have anugh contrast so you can differentiate between the surf block the ground, the walls, etc. I tried adding lighting, but due to the massiveness of the map it was very hard to get right.

A small video showcasing the ending, and that it is possible

<object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/40vqxhQwyws?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/40vqxhQwyws?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>

So at the end, escape quickly, but do not fail or you will die :p


A complete round, which was won. (Not my video)

_sText:
UPDATE 11-NOV-2014: v2_0 released.

---

ze_sunlight by Soft Serve

This is my first fully complete ZE map. I took a lot of inspiration from Zelda and Dark Souls dungeon design, as well as the general atmosphere of Shadow of the Colossus. I hope you enjoy.

Features:

- 5 stages, all with different routes and endings
- 4 special weapons
- 1 boss fight
- Music
- Admin room for changing stages

---

Changelog:

v2_0
- Adjusted ZR config: fewer mother zombies, zombies now have slightly less health
- Changed skybox
- Added/changed some hold points
- Boosted boss health slightly
- Reduced speed of boss lifesteal push
- Reduced boss lifesteal amount
- Boosted melon/orange launcher damage slightly
- Zombies don't teleport as quickly after each hold point
- Changed indoor soundscape to something with less echo
- Optional override config: put your override settings in sunlight_override.cfg
- Various minor changes

v1_0
- Fixed boss and dragon health scaling
- Nerfed all special weapons
- Added 3D skybox
- Added ZR config file
- Fixed stage 2 nuke glitch
- Boosted music volume
- Various minor changes

v0_1
- Beta release

_sText:
The map is based on the game S.T.A.L.K.E.R. I think, you will enjoy the atmosphere of the map. Thanks to all the helpers and testers!

5 STAGES

64 slots

Custom particles

Labaratories, Underground, ChAES, Pripyat and more interesting territories to explore

4 bossfights

Dynamic weather, blowouts, colorcorrection

Spetial items (Artefacts) that can are leveling up (3 level on stage 5) Also zombie items (mutants)

Map need tactics and not trash team to be beaten

Detailed 3D Skybox

OFFICIAL STEAM GROUP:

http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ze_stalker_ultimate

Minor Update: New version ze_space_stationzz. This is a very minor update. If you have version z then you're fine, zz is just a small balance update. ZZ just changes the teleport secret to the new shuttle, and makes it harder to figure out. It wasn't fair to humans when zombies could teleport on top of them. Now it's a much more difficult secret. ze_space_stationzz Note: This is released with the permission of JJ45 and Archanor, the original creators of this map. Zekeus co-authored this with me as well, but I'm the one uploading it here. Unless there are bugs or something, this will be the FINAL version of ze_space_station, at least that I make. Features: 64 Players Radar Cubemaps Nav File Custom Textures 4 Minor Secrets 3 Medium Secrets 1 Insane Death Secret 3 Escape Shuttles 2 Main Routes This version here was made to correct two problems... First of all on a respawn server, players would get killed by the nuke, then respawn. Then they'd get killed again and respawn again. This would continue until the round end or until they went spec. That doesn't happen anymore. The nuke turns off after 3 seconds here. But then this lead to players respawning on the station while all zombies were on shuttles, and they couldn't kill each other. That being a problem as well, I went ahead and made the map prevent players from respawning. So this problem is effectively 100% solved. The other problem was that humans would all get killed the second a zombie spawned on a server with a fast zombie spawn time. The map ups the zombie spawn time to between 20 and 30 seconds, giving players plenty of time to run. But there was still a bottleneck where they would all get killed at the computer room. So to get rid of that and split players up I added a third mini-shuttle which one can get to by taking an entirely new path out of spawn. That way not everyone is in the same spot when a zombie appears. There is also a good camping spot right before the third shuttle, so it's not too hard to hold zombies off. Minor changes: - Area Portals for anti-lag. - Shuttles all move twice as fast as they did in the original ze_space_station release, so less time on them while moving = less lag. - Couple new secrets. There aren't many other changes, but the addition of the new route was too big to release it under the old map name, so this one has its own map submission. Also, the radar map here was improved over the previous one. And that's all I've got here so feel free to ask questions or whatever. NOTE: If you don't know how to open a .7z file, just get the map as a .zip here: ze_space_stationzz

VERSION UPDATE!! Check out ze_space_stationzz instead. It has a third shuttle to escape from the station with. ze_space_station This is a remake of zombie_spacestationflee_beta5 This is being published with the consent of JJ45 and Archanor, the original creators of the SSF maps. This map contains my work as well as that of Zekeus. He designed some secrets and the area with the new shuttle pod. Anyway, map features... 64 Spawns 2 Escape Ships Radar Map Cubemaps 2 Easy Secrets 2 Medium Secrets 1 Insanely Difficult Secret Place Named Nav File Included X-Wing Changes from beta5: Benefits for players in T Spawn: - Sentry guns removed - Door to one room was moved closer to T Spawn - Box stack that blocked terrorists from going left out of spawn removed All that was to even out the field because earlier terrorists could count on being mowed down by zombies on the CT team since they would have to wait for the guns to be deactivated, and they had a longer way to walk than CT's. This makes it a little more even. New Shuttle: Once you destroy the generator, if you hide around the generator room for a little bit a new door will unlock that leads to a second escape shuttle. The door unlocks when the warning voice finishes saying "Power Movement System Overload." Armoury: This is an easy secret. If you go to the old shuttle, when you get to the red bit at the end, there is an armoury at the right. It starts locked, but if you shoot a fluorescent light on the wall near the window in the hall it unlocks the door. X-Wing: If you complete the ridiculously impossible secret from hell you can fly the X-Wing around the map. If you can't figure it out, well, there's always noclip. :) Miscellaneous: - The shuttles now have two more windows at the back, and all windows are now breakable. That way you can go from one shuttle to the other. - New scenery windows near each shuttle. They add to the environment a little. - New secret room in CT spawn. It's easy to find. A similar room existed in Beta 7 but this map is based off of Beta 5. - Red siren lights look different now. - Most walls are now reflective metal and look cooler as a result. If you have any questions or problems please ask!! I will be more than happy to assist you. Also, this map has a working .nav file so it could be used for Headcrab Hunter Mod, but the Headcrabs won't be able to enter the escape shuttles. That's about it. All that's left here is my crappy preview video of the X-Wing:

The map is a space station with 2 spawn rooms.
in each room they are 3 exits, 2 normal exits; 1 by a door and the other 1 by the roof. the 3th exits only opens a few secons before this rooms explode. There's a small room inside the spawn room to hold zombies until the 3th exit opens.  if they "start" near you and you cant scape.

when you exit the crew zone ( spawn rooms and some corridors, which explode in 2 mins) you must take the "huge air vents" to go to the space port where the bunquer and scape pods are located.

in the air vents, they are 1 AI sentry gun who shots the zombies to slow down them.

at the space port, there's a bunquer, with 3 entrances; 1 is the big door, and when it's closed it will never open again; the other 2 are by jumping the wall. In the middle, they are 2 "control panels". when you press them, a lasser blocks every1 to enter by about 40 sec, then, they swap their status to off and then need some seconds to be online another time.

Behind the space port, they are some tunnels. you can enter there by the 3th door at spawn. the tunnel's door will open when the scape pods are ready to fly.

When the scape pods are ready you have 20 sec to enter and hold them (3 scape pods) . If any zombie take a scape pod, they will selfdestruct, so, good luck.

If anyone knows the author, please let me know.

Enjoy!

The story:

You are at a sattelite, zombies have been spotted.
Run to the shuttles, dont forget to shoot the engine, 
this will cause the planes to leave.
While flying you see a second shuttle reaching near you, and it is full of ZOMBIES.
Running through the second sattelite you see everything exploding and escape in the rocket.

Note:
At the first sattelite is a hidden deagle, drop it at the rocket and you 
have acces to close a door, this will make it easyer to defend the rocket.

Skybox is custom and taken from fpsbanana.

Have fun with the map !

Xmas Sorrento

 Xmas Sorrento is a christmas rework of the famous ze Sorrento escape.
Gargantua is aware of this version and allowed me to rework his map.
The map got no big gameplay changes.
Old and known bugs/glitches got fixed.

Features
  • Overall Christmas-Theme Rework
  • Classic Xmas Background Music + Music Room
  • Map Santa Skins
  • New Final Escape House
  • Lots Of Easter Eggs

Special Thanks
  • Moltard and Sgt. Zuff for helping me creating this map.
  • Bloodykiller, Ghostchief and Bird Is The Word for testing the map in early stages.
  • GARGANTUA for giving his permission.
  • I3D CSS Community for testservers and helpful feedback.

A zombie escape map that I have created.

This map is NOT liked with that of rogergargantua.
Is a map I have made myself from scratch.

Sorrento is a well know escape map but it's also a costal town in Italy so the map is based around that town but set in the future.

Resonate means to reflect so lots of metal textures and cube maps.

64 spawns.
1 secret route.
Optimized.
Zombie friendly.

Have fun.

Sorrento Night

Night Sorrento is a graphical and gameplay-technical update of Sorrento Escape v5.
Known Bugs, Glitches and Gameplay-Problems got fixed.
For more infos about gameplay and technical changes look for the more detailed posts below.

Graphics

 Since the latest Sorrento Version is nearly 8 years old, graphics look kind of bad...
With better lighting, custom textures and updated models, I tried to get Sorrento on the latest graphical CSS level.
I also fixed a lot of Geometry-mistakes and rebuilt parts of the map, in order to improve Graphics and FPS.
 

Gameplay

 Sorrento Night got five minor gameplay changes:

  • Slightly increased HP for the first "Main Gate"
  • There is a 30% chance for a power blackout/round
  • Two new ways up to the final "Sea Tower"
  • More parts of the city´s roofs are available for play
  • New small details, which can be used and should slightly improve gameplay variety

The reason for increased HP of the first main gate, is to balance the main way properly and make the sewer way more interesting again.
Once there is a power blackout, you need to reactivate a generator in order to reach the end.
Small signs and useable balconies should bring more gameplay variety.
I added two new ways up to the Sea tower, to break the Secret Boat invulnerability at the end.
One new breakable door near GATE 1, can be accessed by every team.
A second door after GATE 2 can only be opened with a button on the top of the sea tower.
Thanks to GARGANTUA for giving his permission.

All credits goes to Gargantua for making this map.

 People who already got the original map before, won't have any problem with Errors like "Map differ from server", "Missing Map... Disconnecting".


I made this to fix the glitch in the water at the very end, where zombies wouldnt die, and so delay the end of round. 



As I said above, I don't take any credits for this map, I just made a fix for it.
